programme.title: The Broken Glass Theory
programme.desc: Insurance claims investigator Claudio finds himself in a never-ending nightmare in a small town. For what seemed like a simple job, Claudio's task now involves racing against the clock to discover the identity of the worst serial arsonist he has yet seen.

programme.title: Games People Play
programme.desc: An old group of friends gathers to celebrate Mitzi’s surprise birthday party over a nostalgic weekend at an idyllic seaside villa – just like they used to do as teenagers. Mitzi sets off a game that brings old feelings and power dynamics to the surface.

programme.title: Murders on the Cote Sauvage
programme.desc: Amidst cocaine-laden shores, the discovery of Lagne's body plunges Captain Sarah into a web of intrigue. Together with drugs agent Ben, she navigates dark secrets and treacherous alliances to unveil the truth behind the murders haunting the Côte Sauvage.

programme.title: The Vanishing Soldier
programme.desc: An 18-year-old Israeli soldier flees the Gaza battlefield and heads back to his girlfriend in Tel Aviv only to discover that the military elite is convinced he was kidnapped in the fog of war.

programme.title: It Can't Be Real
programme.desc: A sobering film about moving on from childhood traumas – jazz singer Leyla grew up in a broken and dysfunctional family. A chance encounter with a mysterious photographer Murat unhinges her deep-seated pessimism in life and teaches her how to love again.

programme.title: Ghost Mountaineer
programme.desc: In the former Soviet Union, a group of Estonian students go hiking in Siberia. After their unpopular leader Olle vanishes, his rival Eero leads the group to seek help, and a series of bizarre and terrifying events unfold.

programme.title: Blind Dates
programme.desc: Sandro, a middle-aged bachelor, seems to find little success with online dating. Everything changes when he meets and falls in love with Manana. However, it turns out she is married and her husband is just about to be released from jail…

programme.title: Kuma
programme.desc: After being tricked into becoming the second wife of a Turkish man in Vienna, the naïve Ayse accepts her fate and even develops a close friendship with Fatma, the first wife. With Fatma dying of cancer, Ayse has to take over her marital duties.

programme.title: The Devil Inside
programme.desc: Catherine is the head of a parole agency, a wife and a mother. When a 20-years-old charismatic inmate is released on parole, she finds herself ensnared in a sordid affair with him. Their unbridled passion unleashes dangerous consequences for both.

programme.title: 15 Years
programme.desc: After being wrongfully imprisoned for 15 years, piano prodigy Jenny meets Syrian refugee Omar and agrees to accompany him on a talent show. There, Jenny faces the man who framed her and her ex, and she must choose between vengeance and happiness.

programme.title: Gold Runner
programme.desc: After getting robbed, Reza loses his job delivering gold from workshops to jewellery stores. Together with his friend, Reza devises a plan to get back on his feet by finding a legendary diamond at the bottom of an enormous septic tank.

programme.title: Premiere Affaire
programme.desc: Nora, a young and an inexperienced criminal defense lawyer is charged with the case of a teenage boy accused of murdering a neighbour.

programme.title: Baltic Files I - The Body On The Beach
programme.desc: After being transferred to the German-Danish border, Chief Inspector Svenja is tasked with a case involving a body on a beach. With her new colleague Antione, she investigates a case which involves a liquor dealer and a tragedy that goes back decades.

programme.title: The Golden Dream
programme.desc: Juan, Sara and Samuel, all 15 years old, flee from Guatemala towards the USA. On their journey through Mexico they meet Chauk, a Tzotzil indian who does not speak Spanish and has no official documents. They believe they will find a better world beyond the USA-Mexico border but they run into a harsh reality.
